name: Baby Boomz
description:
Switch and match those super-cute baby items - work your way through over a hundred fun levels in this addictive puzzle game. Match 3, 4 or 5 in a row for a special bomb - or try a 2x2 match for a sweet little Fairy helper!

Full of exciting special items and obstacles, it's an easy to play but challenging ride through the seven worlds. Combine bombs where possible for even more destruction! Super sweet!

Get the highest score you can and aim for 3 stars on every level!

Features:

- Over 100 varied and interesting levels - more sweet levels coming soon!
- 7 gameplay types!
- Beat the score
- Beat the timer
- Destroy the jelly blocks
- Fill the level with jam
- Destroy the building blocks
- Collect the items
- Drop the ball
- Super cute graphics and amazing effects
- Share your progress to Facebook, Twitter and Instagram!
- Connect to Facebook to sync your progress across devices!
- 7 different level themes
- Daily rewards on the Wheel of Fortune - can you win the Jackpot??
- "How to Play" instructions (for people who have never played a Match-3 game? No cookie, candy or sweets here, but it plays the same!)
- Cool bombs and sweet special helpers
- Soothing and relaxing in-game music
- Look out for the stinky diapers though!

Baby Boomz is completely free to play, but some of the optional in-game helpers and items may require in-app purchases.
